definitions.definition: A posture or gesture of shrinking or recoiling.
definitions.example: He glanced with a cringe at the mess on his desk.

definitions.definition: An embarrassing event or situation which causes an onlooker to cringe.
definitions.example: There was so much cringe in that episode!

definitions.definition: Someone or something that is cringy.
definitions.example: That video was full of cringe.

definitions.definition: To shrink, cower, tense or recoil, as in fear, disgust or embarrassment.
definitions.example: He cringed as the bird collided with the window.

definitions.definition: To bow or crouch in servility.
To contract; to draw together; to cause to shrink or wrinkle; to distort.
